basics.name: Marco urrea
basics.label: Software
basics.summary: Marco lives in Monterrey. His work mostly focuses on cloud computing; among his other interests are martial arts, strength training and traveling.

highlights: Assignment for a Data integration company:

Creation of recipes and templates on the client's cloud solution to transfer data between different vendors/services such as Salesforce, NetSuite, Magento, Epicor, HubSpot, Workday, Zoho, SugarCRM, ConstantContact, Cherwell, ServiceNow; among others
Providing insights, and knowledge to constantly improve its cloud solution
Work with REST APIs
Reporting errors and helping to make improvements to the platform
Creation of documentation of processes and improving the existing ones
Simplification and improvement of existing scripts and projects
Achievements:
Consecutive high-performance recognition since August on detection of critical bugs and errors on client's cloud platform
Generated documentation for a process which was set the new standard across the company for documentation
Set standards and conventions for its Cloud-based platform
Assignment for a Cloud Computing company:
Maintenance and extension of the current functionalities of PowerShell Scripts generated through C# code to communicate with the clientâ€™s platform
Side Activities:
Provided internal Docker training
SAML configuration from Azure AD side for Terraform Enterprise
Continuous training on HashiCorp products: Vault , Consul and Terraform
Contributed to the improvement of Terraform Enterprise documentation
Co-running a Vault Enterprise workshop

work.summary: Cloud engineer with experience on Azure and Back-end Engineer
highlights: Assignment for a major US oil and gas company
Create a cloud-based solution architecture involving Microsoft Azure services
Solution development and implementation through KANBAN/SCRUM methodologies
PoCs development implementing different OCR technologies and extraction methods
Provide consultation and technical advice on the best approaches to achieve the project solution
Onsite meetings in the clients office
AI and Analytics Platform list of activities
Processes optimization
PoCs of new Azure features and implementation using C# and Python

Development of .Net and .Net Core applications involving Azure services such as Azure Redis Cache, Azure Key Vault, MSI, Data Lake Store, Azure Data Factory v2, Web App, Container Registry, Azure Functions, Storage Account (BLOB Storage), Azure Search, Cognitive search, Microsoft LUIS; among other Azure Features and resources
Apps and Active Directory Management using PIM
Connection of Azure Services using MSI such as Key Vault and Web Apps, Azure Data Lake Store and Azure Data Factory v2
Model generation and training using Azure Machine Learning Workbench leveraging computing to Data Science virtual Machines involving docker

Model generation and training using Azure Machine Learning Service Workspace which involved Azure AutoML and Azure ML libraries, using its API for Python on Azure Notebooks (Jupyter Notebooks), and computing Data Science Virtual Machines and Batch AI processing capabilities
Development of several modules for IoT Edge devices involving docker and Stream Analytics
Provide Python internal training
Continuous contributions on the improvement of Microsoft and Azure Docs
Side Activities:
Provide C# and LINQ training for the Accenture Academy
Automation Lead Engineer in client account; summary of activities:
SAP GUI Automation on C#, Automation of several transactions and several reports by comparing data against given metrics
Heavy automation of processes on Service Now and other websites using Selenium
Generated several Excel reports using EPPLUS and Microsoft Office interop Library for the automation of processes
Desktop application development on C#
Design of algorithms and application architecture for other projects
Programmed some PowerShell scripts
Client, user and app troubleshooting support and maintenance
Back End Web Development Involving .Net Framework
End-to-end development of several apps on different platforms
Front End Web Development involving HTML5, JavaScript and CSS
PoCs of several libraries and frameworks
Manual Quality Assurance testing of a system for a home improvement supplies retailing company
Programmed a semaphore on C# for a factory
UI usability tests of a system for a factory
Performed image manipulation to overlap a set of images on Java, resulting in the output being sent to SAP MII
